name: Truck Track
description:
Download it for Windows too!

CamioNeko is a space trucker with a mission: pick as much containers as he can through the asteroid belt and bring them to the closest planet.

Avoid the asteroids or the hull be so damaged that you'll not be able to carry more.

You can pick Marbles to defend yourself! It's just a shot but you can clear your path with one of these.

Obviously the more containers (🚚🚛) you pick the most difficult it gets. And as you advance stages, time also duplicates (⏱x2) and you have to keep your cargo longer time.

Controls: 

  • WASD or Arrow keys.
  • Shoot with SPACE bar.

Picked Containers in a stage record: 24!!

Music: Jazzy Frenchy Composer: Benjamin Tissot (also known as Bensound)
